column5: According to a report in today's Toronto Star, a Michigan State University (MSU) study has found that sea lamprey in the Great Lakes could be controlled by the smell of ..... dead sea lampreys. No foolin.  Click to read more and see a video of lamprey going nuts.
Very interesting video Craig. Here's hoping it contributes to better control. Thanks for posting.  Dave
GREAT NEWS FOR SURE CRAIG !!! THANKS FOR SHARING ...MAN THEY JUST WENT CRAZY,LETS HOPE THEY GET A FUL PROGRAM GOING....CHEERS
very cool...  but i guess if somebody poured a bucket of blended up human on me... i would wiggle a bit as well
Watch Caddy Shack...all you need is an O'henry bar!
